name: Powerful Shape

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Wild shape class feature, druid level 8th.

sections.body: When in wild shape, treat your size as one category larger for the purpose of calculating CMB, CMD, carrying capacity, and any size-based special attacks you use or that are used against you (such as grab, swallow whole, and trample).
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your wild shapes are mighty and muscular.
